item.title: Thieves build complete ATM
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: From the article: "Audacious thieves in Romania have constructed a complete automated teller machine (ATM), minus the cash box, to steal the details of account holders, banking officials said." "Fake ATMs have appeared at apartment buildings or in areas of the capital where there are no banks, local papers reported." Read the full article.
